hero.headline: Take Control of Your Food Costs
hero.subheadline: Track every gram of ingredient, manage suppliers, and reduce wastage. Profitability starts with smart inventory.

features.title: Real-time Stock Tracking
features.description: Know exactly what's in your pantry. Deduct stock automatically based on usage or manual entry.

features.title: Purchase Management
features.description: Streamline your procurement. Record purchases, manage supplier details, and track expenses over time.

features.title: Financial Insights
features.description: Understand your margins. Compare purchase costs vs. usage to optimize your menu pricing.

reviews.author: Sarah Jenkins
reviews.text: Cravings transformed how we handle orders during rush hour. The digital menu is a lifesaver!

reviews.author: David Chen
reviews.text: The best investment we made this year. Customers love scanning the code and ordering directly.

reviews.author: Emily Rodriguez
reviews.text: Insanely easy to update. We change our specials daily and it takes seconds.

reviews.author: Michael Chang
reviews.text: Inventory management is finally under control. We cut wastage by 20% in the first month.

reviews.author: Priya Patel
reviews.text: Marketing tools are powerful. The automated campaigns brought back so many old customers.

faq.question: Can I import my existing items?
faq.answer: Yes, we support bulk upload for your ingredient list to get you started quickly.

faq.question: Does it link to sales?
faq.answer: Currently, inventory is managed via manual usage entry, but recipe linking is on our roadmap.

cta.title: Stop losing money to wastage
cta.description: Get a clear picture of your inventory today.
